title: Green Leaf Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Raw, Thai, Western, Buffet, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out
description: As of Feb 2016 it no longer offers a la carte menu. Now it offers breakfast set consisting of hummus toast, coconut milk, muesli, fruit, chocolate or coconut mousse; lunch buffet (11am-3pm); dinner buffet (7-10pm); plus shakes, juices, tea, and vegan desserts like choco or coco mousse, coco ice cream.
